body:
Hello people of the one and only Avicus, today I will show you how to spot a very specific type of dood that plays on the server. Nubs. So first you need to know what a nub looks like... 

They have a very weird physique and them seem retarded.. just like this one I spotted earlier!

Look how dumb he looks! He looks so unaware of his surroundings and on the amazing community he is missing out on! What was he even doing upside-down? His neck must have  been in pain...


I was like omg, WHAT A NOOB .BEST.FIND.EVER.!


Ok this is pretty pathetic guys, but, may I come back? I realized a few things today, while building this....


I realized that Avicus has the best community out there... I tried going on other many other popular servers, I would name them all, but I'm afraid I would get banned...


Their communities honestly sucked ass, and Avicus is definitely one of the most balanced servers, donors AREN'T op at all! All the other servers are honestly money whores... DONATE FOR KITS, DONATE FOR XP, DONATE TO WIN!1!!!!!1!!!1!1!!!!!!!




So I realized, well, I realized that my place lied here on Avicus... with the best peeps I ever met.
